mapper.sql: SELECT w.`id`, w.`code_url`, w.`avatar_url`, w.`activity_name`, w.`activity_desc`, w.`activity_scene`, w.`guide`, w.`show_tip`, w.`tip_msg`, w.`customer_server_qr_code`, w.`del_flag`, w.`create_by`, w.`create_time`, w.`update_by`, w.`update_time`, w.`remark`, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM we_group_code_actual WHERE (SELECT IFNULL(scan_code_times, 0)) < scan_code_times_limit AND group_code_id = w.`id`), 0) AS available_codes, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(scan_code_times) AS scan_times FROM we_group_code_actual WHERE group_code_id = w.`id` GROUP BY group_code_id), 0) AS total_scan_times, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM we_group_code_actual WHERE group_code_id = w.`id` AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, sysdate(), effect_time) < 1), 0) AS about_to_expire_codes FROM we_group_code w
mapper.select: SELECT id, actual_group_qr_code, group_name, effect_time, scan_code_times_limit, group_code_id, chat_id, chat_group_name, scan_code_times, del_flag, `status` FROM we_group_code_actual WHERE group_code_id = #{groupCodeId} AND del_flag = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.WeConstans@WE_CUSTOMER_MSG_RESULT_NO_DEFALE} AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) > effect_time AND status = 0

SELECT wg.* FROM we_group wg LEFT JOIN we_group_code_actual wgca ON wgca.chat_id = wg.chat_id AND wgca.`del_flag` = 0 LEFT JOIN we_group_code wgc ON wgc.id = wgca.group_code_id AND wgc.`del_flag` = 0 WHERE wgc.id = #{groupCodeId}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(wgca.scan_code_times), 0) AS scan_times FROM we_group_code_actual wgca LEFT JOIN we_group_code wgc ON wgc.id = wgca.group_code_id WHERE wgc.id = #{groupCodeId} GROUP BY wgc.id

SELECT DISTINCT wgc.code_url FROM we_group_code wgc LEFT JOIN we_community_new_group wcn ON wgc.id = wcn.group_code_id AND wcn.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN we_emple_code wec ON wec.id = wcn.empl_code_id AND wec.del_flag = 0 WHERE wgc.del_flag = 0 AND wec.state = #{state} AND wgc.corp_id = #{corpId} limit 1
SELECT code_url FROM we_group_code WHERE id = #{id} AND corp_id = #{corpId} LIMIT 1
